reviews.review_msg: Prof Malik was a great lecturer who made all of the information accessible in lectures and explained difficult concepts. She gave great feedback on our assignments and showed care to her students. Her lectures had a lot of information and were not recorded, so make sure you go. She gives all the readings in canvas, so no textbook is needed.

She's really friendly and nice. Your mark will be based on a few papers but from my experiance if you put in effort, do your readings and don't plagiarize you'll be fine. Overall I would definitely recommend taking this course

She is best prof ive had at SFU. The readings are heavy however, in lectures she would explain the readings in depth and will expand and connect them to many topics that I would never even think about. Her grading is very clear and provides clear feedback that helps a lot. she really cares about her students learning. Very interesing class with her

Anushay is an awesome prof and makes every story you study very interesting! She cares so much about every individual student. She is very knowledgable, but she talks pretty fast in lecture videos so you have to really pay attention. No tests in this class, only short and easy essays. If you enjoy world history, you will LOVE this class.
